alert.note: Alert for East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 20 at 2:28AM MDT until July 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 288. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. * WIND: Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
